entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
